name: Virgin Brazilian Curly Hair Photos ONLY
description:
----THIS IS ONLY PHOTOS OF THE VIRGIN BRAZILIAN CURLY HAIR STYLED DIFFERENT WAYS -----

 DEvery Bag is 100grams/3.5-4oz.  Virgin hair is non processed which means this hair will only come in natural black. Hair last up to a year+ with proper care. Pure virgin hair, it originates from small villages in Brazil. All of this hair cuticles are aligned in the same direction to prevent excess tangling and matting. It has a gorgeous natural sheen and luster unlike your typical "Beauty Supply Store" bought hair. This hair has no animal or synthetic fibers whatsoever. The hair is extremely versatile allowing you to curl, straighten, color. etc; any technique you would do to your natural hair because its virgin. 
All of the hair is collected from a single donor and then taken through a cleaning process and wefted masterly to perfection. 

Processing time is 24-48 hrs. shipping estimated time 5-7 business days. (not including Saturdays/Sundays)

Here at Hair Couture I believe we all are queens, and a women hair is her crown. This hair is geared to make you feel glamorous yet at a affordable price.

I strive to bring superior customer service and to make sure all of my customers are 100% satisfied.

PLEASE NOTE: For Styling Purposes 2-3 Bundles Are Needed For A Full Installment Depending On The Length Of Hair And Volume You Desire.
Sorry No Refunds
